amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to repeal the restriction on funding for the Preparatory Commission for the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty Organization.
amendment.purpose: Amendment repeals the restriction on funding for the Preparatory Commission for the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty Organization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A013) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 209 (Roll no. 320).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A013) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Foster.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A013) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 209 (Roll no. 320).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Foster amendment (A013) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 209 (Roll no. 320).
